name: Echoes of the Ember Gate
summary: Ancient runes beneath a ruined elven observatory unlock a planar gateway that threatens to pour elemental fire into the Heartlands unless the heroes decipher the seals.

name: Vault of the Frostvein
summary: A lost dwarven vault buried within glacial caverns awakens a primordial frost spirit, forcing unlikely allies to brave the blizzard-haunted depths.

name: Whispers of the Shadowdusk
summary: A cabal of Shadar-kai warlocks sows despair across the frontier; only a band of subtle operatives can trace the whispers back to their bleak citadel.

name: Siege of Goldmantle Keep
summary: Devils loyal to an upstart archduke lay siege to Tarin's ancestral keep, and the heroes must fortify the walls, rally allies, and break the infernal war machine.

name: Labyrinth of the Mistwalker
summary: Portals bloom throughout the Emerald Vale, forming a shifting maze of Feywild echoes; the party must navigate riddles and bargains to reset the planar anchors.
